title.rendered: The Manifest Names Slagato as One of The Most Reviewed App Modernization Companies in The UK

content.rendered:
In an ever-evolving digital landscape, even relatively new fields are branching out into new and exciting directions. App modernization is one of those branches. But since this aspect of app development is relatively new there are a lot of misconceptions about what it’s about and what it entails.

Our team is one of the first that truly delved into the field and provide our clients with the full benefits this process has to offer. This has proven to be one of our most popular services. Because according to their 2022 research, The Manifest named us as one of the most reviews and recommended app modernization companies in the UK.

The Manifest is a business blog resource platform that connects companies with their ideal project partners by creating rankings of the top performers in various industries. This contributes to their research that feeds into their awards program.

Just as the name suggests, it’s main criteria are the quantity and quality of reviews published on our behalf. Our team will benefit from the prestige of this award for a long time and elevate our status in the industry. This is why we want to express our sincere gratitude to everyone who helped make this unique award happen.

We’re always looking for ways to improve our processes and reviews are a great way of learning where we can make those improvements. The fact that we were able to win an award from them is an incredible bonus.

The expectations on our work will understandably get higher because of this accolade. But we’re fully prepared to take on any challenge that comes our way in the coming months.

Intellecsoft is a team focused on digital transformation consultancy and engineering that delivers cutting edge solutions for global organisations and technology startups. They help companies and established brands reimagine their business through digitalisation. If you have a project that’s been brewing on your mind and need a skilled team to bring it to life, visit our website and get that team today.
